plugin.title: vBulletinBot: Process User Selection
vBulletinBot: New Post Notification

phrasetype.name: User Tools (global)
phrasetype.phrase: Here you can select if you want to turn on IM notification for threads to which you are subscribed.
The subscribed threads must have the "Instant notification" turned on. You must have an IM service and screen name configured to use this feature.
Select to turn IM notification on.
Select the IM service through which you wish to use the vBulletin Bot.
Enter the screen name through which you wish to use the vBulletin Bot.
vBulletinBot allows users to read and post new messages from the messageboard through IMs. Here you can select which IM service and what screen name you wish to use with vBulletinBot.

phrasetype.name: vBulletin Settings
phrasetype.phrase: This is the service password used to authenticate the bot client. Please see the documentation for more details.
This is the screen name through AOL Instant Messenger in which users will use to interact with the board. You must register this screen name with the appropriate IM service.
This is the screen name through Google Talk in which users will use to interact with the board. You must register this screen name with the appropriate IM service.
